text: Hello all, when I go to the Apps tab, it is stuck at the loading screen. I tried clearing the cache and launching in an incognito window as recommended by HubSpot support, but it is still stuck at loading. I have super admin rights on an app developer account.

Is there a way to push more records, specifically Line Items, into a development sandbox? I want to build a custom card based on Line Items, but I can't get them into the Sandbox and don't want to have to re-create the their layout and data/content from scratch to test various scenarios
